tasks.task: Explaining sustainable agricultural practices in a farm model
subtasks: Constructing terrace farms with different crops
Demonstrating pomological farm with various fruits
Showing composting of domestic and agricultural waste
Producing biogas from cow dung for fuel
Utilizing solar panels for converting solar energy to electricity
Implementing rainwater harvesting for crop irrigation
Maintaining a fish pond for additional yields
Managing poultry for milk, eggs, and meat production

tasks.task: Describing the benefits of integrated farming systems
subtasks: Reducing input costs through organic methods
Increasing crop yields and profit margins
Efficient land use and resource conservation

tasks.task: Collaborating with agricultural experts and using local materials
subtasks: Consulting agricultural officials for guidance
Recycling materials such as thermocol, LED bulbs, cardboard, and wood

tasks.task: Highlighting environmental benefits of sustainable agriculture
subtasks: Minimizing chemical fertilizer use
Lowering electricity consumption with solar power
Enhancing water management through rainwater harvesting
Integrating multiple crops and livestock for diversified production
